education.title: Software Engineering
description: CGPA: 3.68/4. Relevant Courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Cloud Computing, Web and Mobile Design and Development, Computer Architecture, Object-Oriented Programming.

education.title: Research Intern
description: Developed a carbon-aware scheduling platform to calculate environmental impact of workloads running on servers.
Reviewed 5+ research papers and adapted algorithms for carbon emission calculations, enhancing precision and reliability.
Collaborated with 3 researchers, aligning technical implementations with research objectives for a data-driven approach.

education.title: Coding Academy
description: Key Competencies: Data Structures and Algorithms, Real-World Project Development.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Collaborating as a front-end developer on the Akil platform, connecting over 1300 youth with 30+ organizations.
Leveraged RTK Query to reduce page load time by 20% and improve user engagement.
Integrated a chatbot and text completion into the platform using OpenAI's API, enhancing user interaction and support.
